name: Retro-Venture
description:
Go on an old school adventure to help save your girlfriend, the princesses, for the evil wizards experiments. Explore the magic lands and find hidden secrets that may help you on your journey. 

(I made this out of passion and it is one of my first games, I just hope it is not too bad. Also sorry for the music, I am not used to making music, you should probably mute it)
